general.gigTitle: design and develop a responsive wordpress ecommerce website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Your Front End Designer and WordPress Developer!
sellerCard.description:
Hello, I'm Atiqur Rahman. I'm a post-graduate of CSE, worked in IT company last 5 years with my expert programming skill. I can create 100% responsive websites for any device and I can build your website as per your requirements too. I built more than 250+ websites.

I love to care for clients by providing professional expertise that helps them to grow their businesses.

MY PREMIUM SERVICES::
⬟ WordPress Website ⬟ Landing Page ⬟ eCommerce Website ⬟WordPress SEO ⬟ Website Speed Optimize ⬟ Payment gateway & FB Pixel ⬟ Social Sharing Features ⬟ PSD to Responsive HTML ⬟ PSD to WordPress

description.content:
About This Gig:


Please contact me before placing the order :)


Are you looking for someone who can build a WordPress website with a modern elegant design and functionalities, or are you looking to redesign your old site to make it more attractive, professional, responsive and up to date with the latest trends? Then you are at the right place.


Why Hire Me?


    5+ YEARS of professional experience with WordPress

    Created 250+ Sites

    WordPress websites or blogs I create will reflect YOUR BUSINESS and will COMMAND the visitor to interact with you.

    EASY TO MANAGE and UPDATE your site in the future

    100% Money-Back Guarantee

    On-Time Delivery

    15 Days After Sales Service (24x7 Support)



What do you get?


     WordPress Installation

     Website Design & Redesign

     WordPress Customization

     Woocommerce Functionality & Customization

     Theme Customization

     Custom Page Design

     Landing Page

     Migrate to WordPress

     WordPress Blogs

     Speed optimized

     Live chat integration

     Content upload and much more


Looking forward to working with you!

If you hit the [favorite icon] ️ I will be pleased

slide.name: design and develop a responsive wordpress ecommerce website
design and develop a responsive wordpress ecommerce website
design and develop a responsive wordpress ecommerce website
design and develop a responsive wordpress ecommerce website

questionsAndAnswers.question: 1. If I am a total beginner, how will I manage my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Don't worry, I will show you and provide you with video instructions so that you can manage the website yourself.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 2. Before I start the website, what information do I need to provide?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please provide me with your domain and hosting login credentials with the content for the website (Logo, Text, and Images). No worries, I can create dummy text and images that can be updated later when you have the content. Alternatively, you can update it yourself later.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 3. Do you provide domain and hosting services for websites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Unfortunately, I am not able to provide you with a domain or hosting but I can recommend one.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 4. Do you provide after-completion support?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will provide 15 days of free after-sales service and give you lifetime paid service as well.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 5. Can we communicate except on Fiverr like WhatsApp, Skype, email, etc?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, We cannot communicate outside Fiverr as it is against Fiverr policies. All the communication and deal would be done via Fiverr only.

questionsAndAnswers.question: 6. What if I'm not satisfied with the work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Customer satisfaction is my first priority, and I will do everything in my power to make you happy with my work. Otherwise, I will be happy to refund your wages (cancellation of the order).

questionsAndAnswers.question: 7. Is it necessary to contact you before placing the order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, that will be a smart move :) This will make sure that both of us are on the same page!

questionsAndAnswers.question: 8. Can I get Extra Fast delivery?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you can get extra fast delivery for an additional fee.

seller_response.comment: Thanks again to believe on me.

reviews.comment: Atiqur Rahman demonstrated exceptional professionalism and attention to detail in his website development work. His deep understanding and cooperative nature made the project seamless and enjoyable. Excellent work, highly recommended! You did a GREAT job! 👍

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your feedback. This means a lot to me.
